home.title: Eldis Ymeraj
home.desc: Master’s student in Artificial Intelligence. Passionate about Machine Learning, Data Science and complex data analysis.

items.company: CENOMEXA Laboratory – University of Caen Normandy

projects.desc: Adversarial AI for Domino & Tic-Tac-Toe using MinMax & opponent modeling.

about.title: About Me
about.text:
I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence & Human Factors at the University of Caen. I work on several projects in computer vision, NLP and machine learning.

I am particularly interested in applied AI, complex data analysis and end-to-end ML pipelines.

Outside academics, I enjoy neuroscience, history, sports and traveling.
